mapper.insert: insert into orders(number, status, user_id, order_time, checkout_time, pay_method, pay_status, amount, remark, cancel_reason, rejection_reason, cancel_time, shop_id, coupon_id, should_pay) values (#{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{orderTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{payMethod}, #{payStatus}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{cancelReason}, #{rejectionReason}, #{cancelTime}, #{shopId}, #{couponId}, #{shouldPay})
mapper.update:
update orders
pickup_code=#{pickupCode},
status=#{status},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from orders where user_id = #{userId} order by order_time desc
